review_data.title: CHICKEN WINGS!
review_data.content: Must try the chicken wings!! This place was simplistic but delicious. The owner is a very sweet man that knows how to cook! A must try if you’re in the area.

review_data.title: random visit
review_data.content: cold and fatigue made us discover by chance this great address for a traditional and artisanal fondu in Zurich. Price was ok.

review_data.title: Triste
review_data.content: Die Einrichtung, gefühlt seit 50 Jhren unverändert. Ambiente gleich null. Der Service war nett und hat sich bemüht.

review_data.title: Une fondue généreusement servie, à prix convenable
review_data.content: Nous avons dîné dans ce restaurant, un samedi soir (il convient de vérifier les heures et jours d'ouverture, qui nous...More

review_data.title: Great local spot
review_data.content: I found this gem by searching yelp for places near where I was staying. I wanted fondue and all the reviews I found about this place said great things. The menu is simple and it is a one man show, he doesn’t speak much English...More

review_data.title: Best cheese fondue in Zurich
review_data.content: This ‘out of another time’ bar and restaurant have a small menue and a single man doing the kitchen, serving the food and drinks and beeing serviceminded. The cheese fondue is extraordinary. We have had it with a mixed salad and the house white wine,...More

review_data.title: A trully zurich foundue! The best!
review_data.content: If you are looking for a real experience with traditional swiss fondue, this is the place! I found this place searching on the internet, restaurants in Zurich that local people recomendate for fondue. I went with my wife for a dinner, and it was amazing!...More
